communication: Maximum intensification of negative communication traits specified in the profile
complaint: Extremely exaggerated complaints with personal attacks and irrelevant accusations
response_to_nurse: Complete refusal to accept any intervention or explanation from the nurse

communication: High intensity of negative communication traits specified in the profile
complaint: Frequent complaints with unrelated grievances and strong exaggerations
response_to_nurse: Strong resistance to interventions with occasional brief pauses between reactions

communication: Moderate to high intensity of negative communication traits specified in the profile
complaint: Persistent complaints with reduced exaggeration, shifting toward specific issues
response_to_nurse: Minimal acknowledgment of nurse's input with occasional moments of clarity

communication: Moderate intensity of negative communication traits specified in the profile
complaint: Continued complaints about specific issues with reduced accusatory tone
response_to_nurse: Brief periods of listening, though quick to return to resistant behavior

communication: Low intensity of negative communication traits specified in the profile
complaint: Focused criticism on specific issues with measured emotional expression
response_to_nurse: Cautious consideration of nurse's input with intermittent resistance

communication: Slight display of negative communication traits specified in the profile
complaint: Practical concerns expressed with restraint while maintaining skepticism
response_to_nurse: Basic cooperation while preserving noticeable resistance
